  • Feb 12, 2017

    01. This is an activity sheet.

    My previous activity sheet gave me a weird taste in my mouth so I created a new one. Here is a link to the previous one.

    Over the weekend Ryan, Sid and I completed our first working version of Rainbow. The experience displays a list of the people the user is following on Soundcloud. When a user selects a person they area able to view their likes. Next we are creating working on creating our own custom players and building the experience on mobile.
